tool_description: Creates low-fidelity wireframes for mobile screens, focusing on layout structure, content placement, and basic UI element positioning.

screen_name.description: Name of the screen to wireframe

screen_type.description: Type of screen (login, home, list, detail, form, settings, profile, etc.)

content_elements.description: List of content elements to include (header, navigation, buttons, text fields, images, etc.)

layout_style.description: Layout approach: grid, list, card, tab, or drawer

error_messages: Invalid screen type: Use a recognized screen type (login, home, list, detail, form, settings, profile, etc.)
Invalid layout style: Use grid, list, card, tab, or drawer
Invalid orientation: Use portrait or landscape
Too many elements: Limit content elements to 15 or fewer for optimal mobile UX
usage: Provide screen_name, screen_type, and content_elements; optionally specify layout_style and device_orientation to generate a structured wireframe layout.

element_positions.description: Positioning details for each UI element
